node.title: Olympic hero Taufatofua still awaiting news of family after Tongan disaster
node.description: The taekwondo fighter/cross-country skier has launched an appeal for disaster relief.
node.content: ["Olympic hero\u00a0Pita Taufatofua still hasn't heard any news about his family, since an undersea volcano erupted and tsunami waves struck the coast of his native Tonga on Sunday.", "Governments and relief organisations are mobilising to help the Pacific island nation.", "In the first official statement from the Tongan Government, three people have been confirmed killed - including British national Angela Glover - while all the houses on the island of Mango have been wiped out.", "\"At this moment, I haven't hard any information from Tonga with regards to my family,\" says Taufatofua. \"I haven't heard from my father or any of my family in Haapai, but I'm in the same position that many other Tongas are in.", "More to come\n"]
